title: Face Recogniser
brief: Facial recognition software under PT. ADI CITRA SAKTI

descriptor.detail: During the winter break of 2024, I joined a team tasked to build a facial recognition system under PT. ADI CITRA SAKTI. The system would need to identify employee's from live CCTV input and send Pub/Sub messages to a server.

one.descriptor: I was responsible for maximizing the model's precision. This was done through hyperparameter tuning, image augmentation, and dataset preparation. In order to measure performance, I created an evaluation framework with the help of NumPy.
